title: BRIEF-Aurinia Establishes At-The-Market Facility
text:
BRIEF-Aurinia Establishes At-The-Market Facility

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 13, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Aurinia Establishes At-The-Market Facility Aurinia Pharmaceuticals Inc : * AURINIA ESTABLISHES AT-THE-MARKET FACILITY * AURINIA PHARMACEUTICALS INC - MAY SELL THROUGH AT-THE-MARKET OFFERINGS COMMON SHARES HAVING AN AGGREGATE OFFER PRICE OF UP TO US$40 MILLION * AURINIA PHARMACEUTICALS INC - INTENDS TO USE SALES PROCEEDS TO FUND ITS DRY EYE SYNDROME PROGRAM AND COSTS RELATED TO VOCLOSPORIN

BRIEF-Aurinia Establishes At-The-Market Facility
